jobDescription: In need of a Data Analyst who is able to create insights for clients and internal teams and managers on a variety of data sets. Our ideal applicant has a strong analytical nature with attention to detail and resourceful and pro-active problem solving. This position will enhance processes through building scalable data templates for efficient analysis. This is a 6 month contact position with benefits and potential to extend.  Job Duties:  - Manipulate large sets of data, format information into usable reports and presentations  - Consult with Client Account Managers to provide client data requests and make appropriate recommendations  - Works well under tight deadlines and be flexible to support follow up inquiries  - Interpret and articulate data results for end users  - Examine and evaluate content of existing reports to develop new or improve format function  - Data mining and analysis on projects and provide insights  - Use problem solving skills to resolve data discrepancies  - Other duties as assigned  Qualifications:  - 1-2 years experience with SQL, quantitative data analysis, and reporting  - Bachelors Degree or equivalent in Business, Mathematics, Analytics, or Computer Science  - Demonstrate experience in analyzing data, reporting or developing insights  - Knowledge of Data Visualization techniques (Excel Pivots/Reporting)  - Strong analytical, logical, and organization skills with attention to detail  - Experience working with large datasets and complex relational data models  - Willing and self motivated to learn new technology  - Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage projects independently  Qualified candidates with criminal histories, are considered in a manner that is consistent with local, state and federal laws.
